amendment.description: Amendment establishes a uniformed military Chain of Command for Army National Military Cemeteries and requires that upon the completion of the tenure of the current civilian director, the director position will be filled by a commissioned officer in the United States Military.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 24 printed in House Report 112-485 to establish a uniformed military Chain of Command for Army National Military Cemeteries and to require that upon the completion of the tenure of the current civilian director, the director position will be filled by a commissioned officer in the United States Military.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Wittman amendment (A018) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A018) offered by Mr. Wittman.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Wittman amendment (A018) Agreed to by voice vote.
